website_summaries.verdict: Nice price for a baseball equipment bag that offers multiple features to organize your gear.
pros: Includes a fence hook for convenience
Designed with multiple pockets and an interior shelf in main compartment for simple organization options
Includes a separate, ventilated pocket for shoes
Available in six different color combinations
Can embroider your team logo or the name of the player on the top pocket
cons: Adjustable interior shelf may pop out of position when placed under stress

customer_reviews.title: Mens softball player review
customer_reviews.text: First impression, I love this pack. Plenty of room for what gear I have (no helmet). Shoe compartment easily holds my 11.5 cleats with room to spare. Seems durable and we'll built, season starts soon can't wait to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin S Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag/Quality
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this bag because I bought it for my 6year old son. It’s just too big for him. I thinks it’s more suited for an average sized 10+yr old. Great bag and very well made. I really wanted to keep it but it went from his shoulders to below his knees. In a couple years, I’m buying this for sure. Great quality bag, good zippers, good seams and plenty of room for a larger helmet, mit, cleats etc.
customer_reviews.author: Giang Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ball bag for teen!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bat bag for my 13 yr old daughter. It is a large bag that fits her helmet, ball glove, face mask, two bats, a few 12” softballs, and has a separate area on the bottom that is perfect for her size 10 women’s cleats! I’m sure I’m forgetting some things but you get the idea. It also has a Velcro shelf inside that you can use to organize or take out for one large space. This Easton bag is very sturdy and perfect for your rough older ball player!
customer_reviews.author: KDavis

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Storage Space
customer_reviews.text: Bag has plenty of storage and easily holds a helmet with facemask, infielder's mask, glove, softballs, shoes, water bottle, and still has room for more. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Hawk34

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This baseball backpack is absolutely perfect for my little one. It holds ALL his gear and a few extra practice balls. We use one of the bat pockets for a water bottle, but that's the only variation we have needed. Everything else, shoes, helmet, ball, glove, hat, bat - they all fit if you are willing to work with it just a bit. Once you figure out what works best for your needs, it's easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Efficient, Sturdy, and a Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my boyfriend who is an avid baseball player. He had this huge bag that he carried around and it seemed tiresome after a long day of tournaments. I ordered this backpack for Christmas and he LOVED it. Has enough room for shoes, baseballs, extra clothes, some snacks, and a spot for the bat. Plus clips for hanging on the fences and a top compartment to put things that shouldn’t be squished. I definitely got some girlfriend brownie points for this one. The red is bright and looks very well made.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: I bought the bag for my son (9 years old) ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought the bag for my son (9 years old). He is able to fit 1 baseball bat on the side of the bag. He can fit glove, helmet, and batting gloves in the main compartment. The cleats can fit inside the bottom pouch. The only complain I have is he can't really fit regular water bottle on the side. You would need a smaller water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Wu

customer_reviews.title: Good bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: My 14 yr old has been using this for about 3 weeks playing on a travel baseball team and the compact size, while providing ample storage makes it a great value. He hasn’t been using it long enough to attest to its durability, but so far it appears to be very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Karl

customer_reviews.title: Good bag, but a bit on the small side for a middle school kid.
customer_reviews.text: It's a good quality bag, and a decent price, but it is a bit small inside for a middle school kid. Pouch can hold helmet, glove a few balls and that pretty much fills it up. Phone pocket is nice. Like a lot of kids, he has to hang his cleats off the two bats he has in the side pockets, no way to get those size 9s into the bag itself.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrel of Fury

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. I bought this for my 8 year old. It's a bit bigger than I expected, but once you throw in a couple gloves and a helmet, I wouldn't want anything smaller. Stands out from the others kids on the fence because of the size, but not out of proportion for an 8 year old. Also he's fine carrying this size bag. Easily holds two bats even one that is 2 3/4.
customer_reviews.author: Customer X

customer_reviews.title: Skip the youth size
customer_reviews.text: Holds a good amount but sometimes not enough. Originally got the youth size but that one was too small. Kids can put their uniforms, batting helmet, bats, cleats and a few other things.
customer_reviews.author: Normal people

customer_reviews.title: Men's softball
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Separate shoe storage will hold men's size 13 shoes. Main compartment will hold a 15" glove on the built in shelf and it still has almost a cubic foot of storage room below the shelf for related items.
customer_reviews.author: youdan

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality. Seems to hold his baseball necessities nicely and bag looks sharp. I'm glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: AK2017

customer_reviews.title: No fence hook but good bag.
customer_reviews.text: The ad for this backpack falsely claims it has a fence hook. It’s a decent bag but if you want to hang it on the fence this is not the bag for you.
customer_reviews.author: Paul C

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack!
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack from Easton. It has pockets for everything. Get one to look official but also to keep you wallet in so you don't leave it in the dugout. Keeps everything organized and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: Ringer127

customer_reviews.title: Roomy,but lacks organization
customer_reviews.text: Generally the backpack has a good amount of storage space, but it's really just one giant compartment with enough smaller pockets for organization of small accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Indenbom

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10 and it's a perfect size bag for her. It can hold 2 bats, her glove, pitching mask with quite a lot of room left to spare. There is also another spot just for shoes that is great as well. Seems to be very well made and should last for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a solid bag. I wear a size 11 men’s cleat and they take up most of the bottoms compartment. 2 gloves 2 Softballs and the cleats are about max in this bag.

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my gear
customer_reviews.text: Able to put all my softball gear in this bag. Only come is the elastic strap that holds in the upper part of the bat seems like it could eventually stretch out.
customer_reviews.author: Sully

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Bought the bigger size for my 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Bought the bigger size for my 7 year old, would be good for an adult as well. I put two helmets, two gloves, batting gloves and two bats in it. Use the smaller size for my 4 year old. one helmet and such.

customer_reviews.title: I’m 4’10 so this bag looks big but it’s perfect for what I’m using it for
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag for my pads and martial arts equipment. I’m 4’10 so this bag looks big but it’s perfect for what I’m using it for. Lightweight and easy to pack. Great place to put my kaki sticks. Nothing gets wet and haven’t gotten one rip from wear and tear. Love this bag.

customer_reviews.title: Great bag that fits all the gear!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is a great fit for our 9 year old. It fits the batting helmet and basic gear. After one season of use, looks great! We look forward to getting many years of use.

customer_reviews.title: Solid, gets job done.
customer_reviews.text: Nice and versatile, granted would be nice if there was a water bottle holder. There isn't a lot of room in the actual pockets.

customer_reviews.title: she loved it and it held up rather well

customer_reviews.title: Very nice Bat Pack

customer_reviews.title: Inside divider option
customer_reviews.text: Loved but decided to buy different one maybe later will want the divider option.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around bag
customer_reviews.text: Great bag to carry all of my gear- helmet, cleats, glove, hat, and bats. Looks very nice also.

customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome for the price ... perfect for softball needs

customer_reviews.title: Love it! ⚾
customer_reviews.text: It was exactly what we wanted for my son! He loves it!

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved her softball bag. It was a great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her bag!!! Plenty of room for all her softball equipment!!!! My daughter is very petite but this bag is easy for her to carry and does not bother her back.
customer_reviews.author: Renegade

customer_reviews.title: This bag is AMAZING. It's a little big on my 6 year ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is AMAZING. It's a little big on my 6 year old but he'll grow into it and it's super sturdy. It fits his shoes in the bottom pouch easily with plenty of room to grow. The main bag fits his batting helmet, several baseballs, three gloves - mine, my sons and husbands with plenty of room to spare. the small zipper pouch is great for his batting gloves, place for keys etc. The hook on the back to hang on the fence is exaggerated so it won't fall off the fence as I've seen in other backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: SC1979

customer_reviews.title: Good size bag
customer_reviews.text: Good size bag. My ten year old is 5'5 and it is a perfect size for him. Plenty of room for batting helmet, cleats, balls, etc. My son loves it.

customer_reviews.title: No pockets
customer_reviews.text: Wish there was a pocket that could hold cellphones wallets keys. The pocket on top is barely big enough for keys.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome bag. Purchased for 7 year old son who plays AA little league. This bag has plenty of room for him as he grows to larger pieces of equipment. Fits him great!

product_meta.title: EASTON E210BP Bat & Equipment Backpack Bag | Baseball Softball | 2020 | 2 Bat Sleeves | Smart Gear Storage Shelf | Vented Shoe Pocket | Valuables Pocket | Rubberized Zipper Pulls | Fence Hook
product_meta.description: Easton sport utility 2.0 backpacks are built for the Diamond and beyond, and the new e210bp backpack is no exception. The updated sport utility design makes this backpack even more versatile, including all-new rubberized pullers and a fence hook for Dugout functionality. On the inside, there's a separate vented shoe compartment and an interior shelf to organize your equipment. The outside features a padded back and padded shoulder straps for comfort, two external neoprene pockets for bats and a top pocket for personal items. The top panel is ideal for team embroidery. The e210bp is the largest of the sport utility 2.0 backpacks, providing the most storage space. You do it all on the field, so why not use a bag that does it all off the field.
feature_bullets: All-new Rubberized Pullers, updated Sport utility configuration, and fence hook for Smart gear storage and dugout functionality
Interior shelf in main compartment to organize equipment
Padded back and shoulder straps for comfort
